references.title: W3C HTML5 spec for description lists
WHATWG HTML5 spec for description lists

assertions.title: The screen reader MUST convey the description list role
The screen reader MUST convey the number of term/description groupings in the list
The screen reader MUST convey the boundary of the list (start and end)
assertions.rationale: A user must be able to determine when they enter or leave the list so that they are that content belongs or does not belong to the list.
